topic.title: IMITATION OF THE TRUTH, CYBERPOLITICS, INTERNET, VIRTUAL REALITY AND TELEPRESENCE
topic.body:
There is an interesting article by the Chilean miguel serrano entitled "IMITATION OF THE TRUTH, CYBERPOLITICS, INTERNET, VIRTUAL REALITY AND TELEPRESENCE" that touches on this issue in depth, there will be no possibility of total domination without the old cavalry, today infantry, that takes the role as a dominant colonizer of the territory. If they do not achieve that, what they do is purely mental spiritual with their means that ends when man begins to destroy the fiber optic networks.

"It is very interesting to know that almost always, in the last Pentagon war games, played in virtual reality, on videos and computers, their cyber-armies appear as being defeated by much weaker enemies and by armies of the" Second "and" First Wave. "And this is because, lacking a complicated and centralized communications network, and their forces being dispersed, disconnected and disorganized, they are less vulnerable to a total attack by the Infogwar. And the final domination over a defeated country It can only be carried out by man, by the old and traditional Infantry and not at a distance, by robots and machines. Not yet. And the weakness of the great power is in the little value of its human being, regressed, distorted by the almighty machine and super technology. "

https://mamanga.blogspot.com/2006/04/un-articulo-de-miguel-serrano.html
